cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotowaru

sentence.kanji: 私は彼のプロポーズを断った。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no puropo-zu wo kotowata
sentence.english: I turned down his marriage proposal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hirune

sentence.kanji: 私の子供は毎日昼寝をします。
sentence.romaji: watashi no kodomo ha mainichi hirune wo shimasu
sentence.english: My child takes a nap every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryouhou

sentence.kanji: チョコレートとケーキを両方ください。
sentence.romaji: chokore-to to ke-ki wo ryouhou kudasai
sentence.english: I'll have both the chocolate and the cake, please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryougae

sentence.kanji: 1万円を両替してください。
sentence.romaji: ichimanen wo ryougae shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please exchange 10,000 yen for me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikazuku

sentence.kanji: 女性が近付いてきました。
sentence.romaji: josei ga chikazuite kimashita
sentence.english: A woman approached me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's satou

sentence.kanji: コーヒーに砂糖は入れますか。
sentence.romaji: ko-hi- ni satou ha iremasu ka
sentence.english: Do you take sugar in your coffee?

cards.english: natural, as a matter of course
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touzen

sentence.kanji: 彼女が怒るのも当然だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ga okoru no mo touzen da
sentence.english: It's natural that she should be angry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuufu

sentence.kanji: その夫婦はとても仲がいい。
sentence.romaji: sono fuufu ha totemo naka ga ii
sentence.english: That couple gets on very well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyousou

sentence.kanji: 2社は互いに競争している。
sentence.romaji: nisha ha tagai ni kyousou shite iru
sentence.english: Two companies are competing with each other.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bentou

sentence.kanji: 今日は弁当を持ってきました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha bentou wo mote kimashita
sentence.english: I brought a lunch box today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kangofu

sentence.kanji: 母は看護婦です。
sentence.romaji: haha ha kangofu desu
sentence.english: My mother's a nurse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は会社を訴えた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kaisha wo utaeta
sentence.english: She sued the company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryouri

sentence.kanji: 母は料理が得意です。
sentence.romaji: haha ha ryouri ga tokui desu
sentence.english: My mother is good at cooking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rika

sentence.kanji: 私は理科が得意です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha rika ga tokui desu
sentence.english: I'm good at science.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuukyuusha

sentence.kanji: 誰か救急車を呼んでください。
sentence.romaji: dareka kyuukyuusha wo yonde kudasai
sentence.english: Someone please call an ambulance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenkou

sentence.kanji: 私は健康な生活を送っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kenkou na seikatsu wo okute imasu
sentence.english: I'm living a healthy lifestyle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuu

sentence.kanji: 急な坂道を上った。
sentence.romaji: kyuu na sakamichi wo nobota
sentence.english: I went up the steep hill.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oreru

sentence.kanji: 強風で木の枝が折れた。
sentence.romaji: kyoufuu de ki no eda ga oreta
sentence.english: The tree branch broke in the strong wind.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochiiru

sentence.kanji: 彼はその詩を用いて自分の気持ちを伝えた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sono shi wo mochiite jibun no kimochi wo tsutaeta
sentence.english: He conveyed his feelings through poetry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nebou

sentence.kanji: 今朝は寝坊しました。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha nebou shimashita
sentence.english: I slept in this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youji

sentence.kanji: 父は用事で出掛けています。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha youji de dekakete imasu
sentence.english: My father is out running errands.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiko

sentence.kanji: 彼は事故で怪我をしました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jiko de kega wo shimashita
sentence.english: He was injured in the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tazuneru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は道を尋ねた。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha michi wo tazuneta
sentence.english: She asked for directions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haku

sentence.kanji: 床をほうきで掃きました。
sentence.romaji: yuka wo houki de hakimashita
sentence.english: I swept the floor with a broom.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ha

sentence.kanji: 私の歯は丈夫です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ha ha joubu desu
sentence.english: My teeth are strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oru

sentence.kanji: 祖父は足の骨を折りました。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha ashi no hone wo orimashita
sentence.english: My grandfather broke a bone in his foot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's au

sentence.kanji: 彼は交通事故に遭った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koutsuu jiko ni ata
sentence.english: He had a traffic accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hamigaki

sentence.kanji: 歯磨きはしましたか。
sentence.romaji: hamigaki ha shimashita ka
sentence.english: Have you brushed your teeth?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakujitsu

sentence.kanji: 昨日は雨でしたね。
sentence.romaji: sakujitsu ha ame deshita ne
sentence.english: It rained yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's michiru

sentence.kanji: 月が満ちてきましたね。
sentence.romaji: tsuki ga michite kimashita ne
sentence.english: The moon is waxing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manin

sentence.kanji: このバスは満員です。
sentence.romaji: kono basu ha manin desu
sentence.english: This bus is full.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mangetsu

sentence.kanji: 今日は満月ですね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha mangetsu desu ne
sentence.english: It's a full moon today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koto

sentence.kanji: そんな事をしてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: sonna koto wo shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Do not do such a thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikamichi

sentence.kanji: こっちが近道です。
sentence.romaji: kochi ga chikamichi desu
sentence.english: This is a shortcut.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuryou

sentence.kanji: このトイレは有料です。
sentence.romaji: kono toire ha yuuryou desu
sentence.english: This is a pay toilet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukuribanashi

sentence.kanji: その子が言っていることは作り話です。
sentence.romaji: sono ko ga ite iru koto ha tsukuribanashi desu
sentence.english: What that kid said is a made-up story.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiyou

sentence.kanji: 私用で出かけなければなりません。
sentence.romaji: shiyou de dekakenakereba narimasen
sentence.english: I must go out on a personal errand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's you

sentence.kanji: 私に何か用ですか。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni nanika you desu ka
sentence.english: Do you need me for something?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youjin

sentence.kanji: 夜道は用心して歩きましょう。
sentence.romaji: yomichi ha youjin shite arukimashou
sentence.english: Be careful when walking at night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichiyouhin

sentence.kanji: 今日は日用品の買い物をした。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha nichiyouhin no kaimono wo shita
sentence.english: I did grocery shopping today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyouji

sentence.kanji: 今日は学校で行事がありました。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha gakou de gyouji ga arimashita
sentence.english: There was an event at school today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsu

sentence.kanji: 量より質の方が大事です。
sentence.romaji: ryou yori shitsu no hou ga daiji desu
sentence.english: Quality is more important than quantity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's manten

sentence.kanji: 国語のテストは満点でした。
sentence.romaji: kokugo no tesuto ha manten deshita
sentence.english: I got full marks on a Japanese test.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiatari

sentence.kanji: この部屋は日当たりがいい。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha hiatari ga ii
sentence.english: This room gets a lot of sunshine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hinshitsu

sentence.kanji: このメーカーの製品は高品質だわね。
sentence.romaji: kono me-ka- no seihin ha kouhinshitsu da wa ne
sentence.english: The products from this manufacturer are high-quality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kentou

sentence.kanji: この仕事には何日必要か見当もつかないね。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ni ha nannichi hitsuyou ka kentou mo tsukanai ne
sentence.english: I can't predict how many days are needed for this job.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isakujitsu

sentence.kanji: 一昨日、お電話を差し上げました。
sentence.romaji: isakujitsu odenwa wo sashiagemashita
sentence.english: I gave you a call the day before yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoukin

sentence.kanji: まだ料金は払っていないけど。
sentence.romaji: mada ryoukin ha harate inai kedo
sentence.english: But I haven't paid the charge yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooisogi

sentence.kanji: 大急ぎでその仕事を仕上げたよ。
sentence.romaji: ooisogi de sono shigoto wo shiageta yo
sentence.english: I finished up the work in a rush.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakumotsu

sentence.kanji: 米はアジアでは大切な作物だ。
sentence.romaji: kome ha ajia de ha taisetsu na sakumotsu da
sentence.english: Rice is an important crop in Asia.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toujitsu

sentence.kanji: 入場券は当日でも買えますよ。
sentence.romaji: nyuujouken ha toujitsu de mo kaemasu yo
sentence.english: You can buy admission tickets on the same day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakaru

sentence.kanji: これからは経営の合理化を図りたいと思います。
sentence.romaji: korekara ha keiei no gourika wo hakaritai to omoimasu
sentence.english: From now on I want to attempt to streamline management.
